tasks.label: Test Backend
tasks.command: source python-env/bin/activate; cd qurry_api; python3.9 manage.py test

tasks.label: Build Database (for first time)
tasks.command: source python-env/bin/activate; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py makemigrations --empty users questions media; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py makemigrations users questions media; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py migrate users; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py makemigrations; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py migrate;

tasks.label: Make & Install Migrations
tasks.command: source python-env/bin/activate; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py makemigrations users questions media; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py migrate users; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py makemigrations; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py migrate;

tasks.label: Export Data
tasks.command: source python-env/bin/activate; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py dumpdata -v 3 --indent=4 -e sessions -e admin -e contenttypes -e auth.Permission > ./records.json

tasks.label: Import Data
tasks.command: source python-env/bin/activate; python3.9 qurry_api/manage.py loaddata -v 3 records.json
